EmailTemplate.name: Business Select - Office Supplies Trigger.BS - Office Supplies
EmailTemplate.subject: Hey {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, This Will Tempt You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Keep The Office Clean & Refueled Now is the perfect time to restock supplies.
Get 15% OFF** your purchase of $75 or more.
Use Code 2020DEAL $2.04/BX Grand & Toy Standard Staples Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/99500_Grand__Toy_Standard_Staples_14_5000BX.aspx?cmp=EBBSOFFICESUPPLIESEN?utm_source={{my.UTM+Source}}?utm_medium={{my.UTM+Medium}}?utm_content={{my.UTM+Content}}?utm_campaign={{my.UTM+Campaign}}]]> $1.52/EA Paper Mate Retractable Ballpoint Pens Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/095101_Paper_Mate_Recycled_FlexGrip_Ultra_Retractable_Ballpoint_Pens_1_0_mm_Blue.aspx?cmp=EBBSOFFICESUPPLIESEN?utm_source={{my.UTM+Source}}?utm_medium={{my.UTM+Medium}}?utm_content={{my.UTM+Content}}?utm_campaign={{my.UTM+Campaign}}]]> $12.15/PK Grand & Toy Economy Letter-Size Pads Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/99730_Grand__Toy_Economy_Letter-Size_Pads_White_with_Wide_Rule_8_12_x_11_5PK.aspx?cmp=EBBSOFFICESUPPLIESEN?utm_source={{my.UTM+Source}}?utm_medium={{my.UTM+Medium}}?utm_content={{my.UTM+Content}}?utm_campaign={{my.UTM+Campaign}}]]> Other Office Favourites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/Office-Supplies/_/N-1z0czraZaf2?cmp=EBBSOFFICESUPPLIESEN?utm_source={{my.UTM+Source}}?utm_medium={{my.UTM+Medium}}?utm_content={{my.UTM+Content}}?utm_campaign={{my.UTM+Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 2020DEAL at checkout. not valid on copy paper, bottled water, ink & toner, services, printing, hardware, software or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢.
